definition[0]: using a small number or letter slightly above and to the right of a number or letter that shows how many times a quantity is to be multiplied by itself
definition[1]: a rate of growth that becomes faster and faster over time
example[0]: Tropical diseases are becoming more common in affluent parts of the world due to an exponential increase in air travel during the past fifty years.
example[1]: The social security budget was rising at an exponential rate.
